Text: More seeders! Cmon, I'm stuck at 15 kb/s -.-
I'm sorry, i know this is a feeble question, but can somebody tell me what i need to do to combine the files into a watchable episode?  thanks much

Novub: You need a program such as Winrar, you can download a trial version free or just find a torrent of it. you need to open any part of the .001, .002, .003 etc files with winrar and then click extract to and navigate to where you want the watchable file.
